description:
This content requires "Shadowverse: Champion's Battle" and cannot be used with the demo version.

Purchasing this content will add premium rewards to each level of the Battle Pass. Leader skin Premium Pass rewards are also sold separately.

Leader skins rewards:
-Level 3: "Shadow Knight: Zechts"
-Level 9: "Shiro Kiriyama"
-Level 15: "Makise"
-Level 30: "Alice: Underworld Sovereign"

Other rewards:
-Emblems
-Card Sleeves
-Rupies
-Umbra Coins
-Card Packs
-Leader Skins
-Flairs
-Mythical Cards (Random)

Notice
-Be careful not to purchase the same content twice. This Premium Pass contains the following items that are also sold separately: "Leader Skin: 'Alice: Underworld Sovereign'", "Leader Skin: 'Makise'", "Leader Skin: 'Shiro Kiriyama'", "Leader Skin: 'Shadow Knight: Zechts'".
name: Season 4 Premium Pass
